# About


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
set.seed(2)
about <- data.frame(
    image = here::here("static", "about") |> 
      list.files() |>
      sample()
  ) |>
  dplyr::mutate(link = dplyr::case_when(
    image == "burnt.jpg" ~ "https://essays.djnavarro.net",
    image == "jasmine.jpg" ~ "https://learningstatisticswithr.com",
    image == "rainbow.png" ~ "https://art.djnavarro.net",
    TRUE ~ NA_character_
  ))
  

bs4cards::cards(
  data = about, 
  image = image,
  layout = "image-only",
  link = link,
  label_colour = "#333333", 
  border_radius = 0, 
  spacing = 4,
  width = 2
)
```
